events.message: The insured reported an auto accident involving a rear-end collision on the highway around 8am.
The claim was categorized under auto accident due to the vehicle collision described in the initial report.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle this case promptly for further investigation.
The claim has been formally acknowledged and the insured was informed about the next steps in the process.
Request sent for police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and witness statements to support claim investigation.
Insured submitted police report, photos, and witness affidavits as requested for assessing the damage claim.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and scheduling vehicle inspection to verify damages.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of collision details and verified extent of damage to the insured vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair estimates and policy coverage details provided to the insured.
The insured responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the handling process.
The claim was formally approved for repair cost coverage following acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
The payment for the vehicle repair was processed and issued to the insured's preferred account without delay.
The claim was officially closed after confirming completion of repairs and receipt of payment by the insured.
All claim files and related documents have been archived as per company protocol for future reference.
